alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 11:20AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Geauga... Lake and Ashtabula Counties Until 115 PM EST.... At 1119 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Lakeline to near Orwell, moving northeast at 20 mph. This band will continue wobble across area with individual bursts of snow moving east at 20 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Orwell, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe and Richmond Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 326, 330, 331, and 332.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
